official_title: Commending the designation by Central High School in Chattanooga, Tennessee, of the high school's football stadium and football field as "Central Memorial Stadium" and "Etter-Farmer Field", respectively.

summary.text: Commends the designation by Central High School in Chattanooga, Tennessee, of its: (1) football stadium as Central Memorial Stadium in honor of the men and women who attended the school and died during wartime while serving with the U.S. armed forces; and (2) football field as Etter-Farmer Field in honor of E.B. "Red" Etter and Stan Farmer (former football coaches at the school).

titles.title: Commending the designation by Central High School in Chattanooga, Tennessee, of the high school's football stadium and football field as "Central Memorial Stadium" and "Etter-Farmer Field", respectively.
